abstract: The National League vies for attention with two Game 5s set for Friday after St. Louis continued to confound the Phillies and the Diamondbacks go home-crazy against the Brewers.
snippet: The National League vies for attention with two Game 5s set for Friday after St. Louis continued to confound the Phillies and the Diamondbacks go home-crazy against the Brewers.
lead_paragraph: If you were, like many people, ready to completely ignore the National League until it finished crowning the Phillies as its inevitable World Series participant, you might be surprised to know that both N.L. division series have now reached a fifth game. And they have done so in highly entertaining fashion. St. Louis is apparently employing a resourceful squirrel to mess with the Phillies' juju, and the still anonymous Diamondbacks are clubbing the ball as if they are the 1927 Yankees, while the Brewers play the role of piñata. And so there will be two Game 5s on Friday night to decide things.

headline.main: Leading Off: National League Makes a Play
